DOC.brief_summary: This extension study will allow for further follow-up of the disease under treatment with imatinib mesylate and allow patients to continue to receive imatinib mesylate.
DOC.brief_title: An Extension Study of the Safety and Anti-leukemic Effects of Imatinib Mesylate in Adult Patients With Ph + Leukemia
DOC.criteria: Successful completion of the CSTI571A 0110 E1 study Written informed consent for the extension CSTI571A0110E2 none Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply.
